scripts.text:
INSERT INTO dbo.dvf_dvf
SELECT
    CONVERT(date, [Date mutation], 103),
    [Nature mutation],
    CAST(REPLACE([Valeur fonciere], ',', '.') AS DECIMAL(18,2)),
    [No voie],
    [B/T/Q],
    [Type de voie],
    [Code voie],
    [Voie],
    [Code postal],
    [Commune],
    [Code departement],
    [Code commune],
    [Code type local],
    [Type local],
    [Identifiant local],
    CAST(REPLACE([Surface reelle bati], ',', '.') AS INT),
    CAST(REPLACE([Nombre pieces principales], ',', '.') AS INT),
    CAST(REPLACE([Surface terrain], ',', '.') AS INT)
FROM dbo.dvv_bronze;
